text: Hiwa tinachu taksa-ah innei sangai chu Pathian 9:8: neisik kasuok mak naipang innei ngaikha eii. Hiwa ngai minkhina chu Abraham phungrui Ishmael makheiya innei ngaikha in eii, Ama sa Hagar makheiya innei ngaikha in eii.sangai kha emu, hiwa rathuulla Pathian chong inkhitna dungjuiya innei sangai kha inthiang phungrui in-eii tia alei.
